Ragnar heard Rodimus and started running to the exit. Blackfang 
sprinted and went before him.

Blackfang: Bet you're slow and steady, right, Ragnar?

Ragnar: Nothing's more steady than my aim, friend! I will slag them 
all!

Katya came near him.

Katya: You take on the big ones. Try to make a front with the flyers. 
I will soften up the smaller ones. Blackfang, come with me. You are 
fast too, so we will chew them up just enough make it eaier for our 
big guns. 

Blackfang was startled to receive orders from her. She clearly knew 
what she was doing. He took his energy shotgun out.

Blackfang: Roger, Ma'am.

Ragnar came out of the base with a bristling of both his large lasers 
and a salvo of mini-missiles. He aimed no one in particular, but he 
knew his long-range firepower would at least make them think twice.

Ragnar: Kup! Let us regroup! Katya seems to have thrown honor out of 
this fight. She will hit them while they are far so we can finish 
them.

Blackfang and Katya went running around, covering in the trees near 
the base. They would wait a moment to see who was the best target.
